metadata.description: Official election timeline for the 2026 Kerala Assembly Elections. Dates are pending official announcement by the Election Commission of India.
metadata.update_instructions: Replace all 'TBA' values with official dates once ECI announces the schedule. Update 'status' field to 'ANNOUNCED' and set 'announcement_date'.

announcement.notification_note: The ECI will formally announce the full election schedule including all below dates via a press conference and official Gazette notification.

model_code_of_conduct.comes_into_effect: TBA — same date as election announcement
model_code_of_conduct.lifted_on: TBA — after counting and result declaration
model_code_of_conduct.description: The Model Code of Conduct (MCC) comes into effect immediately upon announcement of the election schedule and governs conduct of political parties, candidates, and the government until results are declared.

election_notification_date.label: Date of Notification
election_notification_date.description: Official notification published in the Gazette. Nomination process begins from this date.

last_date_of_nomination.label: Last Date of Filing Nominations
last_date_of_nomination.description: Candidates must file their nomination papers with the Returning Officer by this date.

scrutiny_of_nominations.label: Scrutiny of Nominations
scrutiny_of_nominations.description: Returning Officer verifies and scrutinises all filed nominations for eligibility.

last_date_of_withdrawal.label: Last Date of Withdrawal of Candidature
last_date_of_withdrawal.description: Candidates may withdraw their nomination on or before this date. Final candidate list is published after this.

poll_date.label: Date of Poll
poll_date.description: The actual voting day. Polling stations open 7:00 AM to 6:00 PM.

counting_date.label: Date of Counting
counting_date.description: Votes are counted and results declared on this date.

completion_date.label: Election Process Completion Date
completion_date.description: Date by which the entire election process must be completed as specified in the notification.

voter_service_deadlines.note: Voter service deadlines (form submission cutoffs) are determined relative to the notification/poll dates. These will be populated once official dates are announced.

form_6_new_registration.label: Last date for new voter registration (Form 6)
form_6_new_registration.reference: Typically several weeks before poll date — check CEO Kerala for exact cutoff.

form_8_corrections.label: Last date for corrections / address change (Form 8)
form_8_corrections.reference: Typically several weeks before poll date.

form_7_deletion_objection.label: Last date for objections / deletions (Form 7)
form_7_deletion_objection.reference: Typically several weeks before poll date.

postal_ballot_application.label: Last date for postal ballot application (85+ and PwD voters)
postal_ballot_application.reference: Apply to ERO after notification date. Deadline announced after schedule is released.

assembly_constituencies_kottayam.description: Assembly constituencies within Kottayam district that will go to polls.
assembly_constituencies_kottayam.note: Constituency boundaries are as per 2008 delimitation. All below constituencies will vote on the same poll date.

reference_timeline_2021.description: 2021 Kerala Assembly Election timeline (same structure, actual dates for reference only — do NOT use these as 2026 dates).
reference_timeline_2021.disclaimer: These are historical reference dates for JSON structure validation only.

vaakku_bot_behaviour.when_dates_are_tba: Clearly inform the user that official dates have not yet been announced by ECI. Direct them to https://www.eci.gov.in or https://www.ceo.kerala.gov.in for the latest updates.
vaakku_bot_behaviour.when_dates_are_announced: Read from key_dates fields and provide structured response with dates, countdown if applicable, and any deadlines that are approaching.
